name: redundantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unnecessary because it is more than is needed: It includes both written explanations and pictures to convey, slightly redundantly, the same information. The media focuses on the two main candidates, redundantly reporting the same slogans day after day.
More examplesFewer examplesThe old system was quite inefficient, as it stored data pretty redundantly.He has a habit of redundantly repeating certain words.In older texts, we can find the redundantly marked, suffixed forms "worser" and "lesser".
